features: 💡 Seller Warranty - We offer 18 Months Warranty. Please feel free to contact us if the product has any quality issues.
💡 As all our products are fulfilled by Amazon, if you have any questions about shipment, exchange or returns, please contact Amazon Customer Service directly.
✅ SAFETY PROMISE -- Made of Food-Grade TPU material, 100% BPA & PVC Free, the soft water bottle is tasteless and eco-friendly. Flexible soft flask is ideal for marathon, running, cycling, etc
✅ SPACE SAVING -- Soft water flask is compact and built for a long life for durable use. The running flask stands upright when it full and shrinks in the min volume while empty, no burden for sports
✅ EASY DRINK -- Light squeeze gives ample hydration, high-flow bite valve auto-seals after each sip, without leaking. Convenient collapsible water bottle for daily, travel or outdoor sports
✅ PRACTICAL -- The folding water bottle with straw/nozzle can be frozen and chilled overnight, easily get a refreshing beverage on the hot day. ( Recommended used temperature: 0 - 40 ℃ )
✅ EASY CARRYING -- Ultra-light hand water bottle is easy to fold and carry. It can fit easily in most hydration vest, belt or pack pockets. Great soft hydration flask for men, women and kids

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TRIWONDER Soft Flask The soft bite valve provides a higher flow rate for easy drinking and a gentle bite. It is foldable and easy to carry, fitting perfectly into your running belt or even your pants or jacket pocket. Ideal for camping, mountaineering, hiking, cycling, running, jogging, gym workouts, summer camp trips, and other outdoor activities.

DETAILS Silicone bite valve for easy drinking. Soft material that can be compactly folded. Detachable nozzle for easy cleaning. High-flow bite valve with automatic sealing, no leakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Water bottle review
reviews.reviewText: The TRIWONDER Handheld Water Bottle, with its 17 oz capacity, is an excellent choice for runners seeking hydration without the hassle. Its soft flask design, combined with a hand strap, makes it comfortable and easy to carry. The Quick Grip Chill feature is a standout, providing a steady and convenient grip during long runs. Being BPA-free adds to its appeal for health-conscious individuals. The blue color gives it a stylish look. Overall, this hydration pack is a practical and user-friendly accessory for runners of all levels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great handheld running water bottle.
reviews.reviewText: It's true that the bite valve gives you a sip not a gulp, but for me this is perfect because I don't want to stop to drink or choke on a gush of water. I use this for longer runs when I want to have my electrolyte drink to hydrate and avoid cramps. I'll carry it full for several miles before I start taking sips. The handy thumb hole makes it natural to hold without exerting a lot of grip effort. You can cinch down the adjustable strap to make it hug your hand as it empties. Once empty you can tuck it in a pocket or waist band easily. I bought a couple more of these to have them handy wherever I am and to have an extra or two for a marathon.I'm not sure what other people are expecting form this water bottle. I detected no bad taste. Lots of things come with that "do not eat" packet -- if you are dumb enough to eat it you should not be shopping unsupervised. It probably does taste terrible -- I couldn't tell you. I have used the three of these I bought for many miles, in training and races and no leaks, no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Interesting idea. Worth having.
reviews.reviewText: There are comments about the smell. If you soak it about 1/2 hour in salted water, it will take that away. I used probably a tablespoon of salt, soaked it in a bowl so it was fully submerged. I've used it a few times and no weird taste at all.SIze: It really only holds 16 ounces, but in the holder it's just 15 ounces. It's a little off balance and still too big for my small hands, but I do think it's a good product because it really doesn't leak at all and the spout works well.Spout: mixed reviews about the oddball spout. It seems like you can't drink well from it, but if you just pinch the very top edge, it does spout out really well. Took some getting used to.With the collapsable nature, I was able to fit it into my Lululemmon side pocket.I really love my "Bottle Band" which is a strap that can fit any water bottle, including a Polar bottle. But this one is also pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used a smaller version of this without the zipper case for several years including skiing. It’s still going strong. No leaks. It lives in the bottom of my backpack. I take care of my stuff. Bought this one because it’s larger and has a case to make it easier to use and protects it. The case even has a little pocket for cards and DL. What’s to not like?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these to carry extra water on runs. I can deal with the difficulties of drinking from the nipples and lack of access to clean the interior or the lid, for the reusability of these items and the ability to carry so much water. But I cannot deal with how much the lid on one of the bottles leaks, it goes all over me and wherever I lay my pack down. I tried messaging the company over a defect in another item that I received from them and have yet to hear back from them, therefore I view this as a lost cause right now. I would not recommend buying products from this manufacturer/seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not like the name brand—weeps/leaks
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of the 600ml and the included straw, but I'm disappointed that after a couple of months of use, the bottles weep and if you squeeze them a bit, they leak right through the plastic. I've had other brands last years without this issue. I can still use it, but constantly getting my pack wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and quality
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for cold weather runs, hot yoga, and sight seeing.I bought this bottle to have a light weight water bottle that could also double as a wallet so I can keep my car key and valuables with me during group exercise classes and sightseeing. I don’t like to rely on lockers for anything that would be upsetting to lose.Straps and design. There is ample reflective strips on the hand strap and front of the bottle. The reflective material is sewn so that there are loops to attach a carabiner. The hand strap is one of the most comfortable I’ve used. Soft lining to prevent chaffing and breathable mesh with a comfy thumb hole. The blue color with lime green accents is very attractive.Pocket. Can fit chapstick, car key, tissues, a few dollars, and ID. And I have room to spare.Material. The fabric is sturdy yet lightweight so it wouldn’t add unnecessary weight to your hand. The sewing is solid.Water capacity. Water bladder style with bite mouth piece. To drink water, you bite down on the mouth piece and sip. Without the bite pressure, the bottle stays closed and no water leaks out even when the bottle is on it’s side or upside down. Love that I can take a quick sip and toss the bottle back onto my mat without fussing with closing a lid and potentially disrupting yoga class. The bladder that came included fits about 12 ounces of water. I wouldn’t use it on long hot weather runs where I need a lot of water, but it’s perfect and lightweight for winter runs, gym, hot yoga, and general walking around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: These are great and super easy to use. Perfect amount of water for a short (under 7mile) run.
Ces produits sont exactement pour la veste que j ai commandé pour la durée dans le temps ça reste a déterminer

I have 2 of these now - I love that they make no sloshing sound as you run! Ordinary plastic bottles have the water slosh around as soon as you take a few sips. Because these have no air in the soft flask, there is no sloshing around.No leaks as well; the bite nozzle works well and does not leak even if you squeeze the bottle firmly.The storage compartment is great as well - large enough for a few gels, credit cards etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad pero le falta practicidad después de usar
reviews.reviewText: Buen material resistente buena boquilla sin embargo el material en donde enroscas y su extremo no es flexible y eso complica guardar en un bolsillo el contenedor cuando se vacía por esa razón calificó así, una vez usando se vuelve estorboso para continuar corriendo, se debió usar un material más flexible y con ello quizá comprometer la resistencia, es más ergonómico una ánfora rígida para un bolsillo de chaleco que esté contenedor con ese aro amplio superior bajo la tapadera
